description:
My setup was working properly  suddenly its throwing errors : 


command : nova-manage service list 

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 80, in <module>
    from nova import context
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/context.py", line 26, in <module>
    from nova import utils
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/utils.py", line 52, in <module>
    import lockfile
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/lockfile.py", line 363, in <module>
    class SQLiteFileLock(LockBase):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/lockfile.py", line 367, in SQLiteFileLo          ck
    _fd, testdb = tempfile.mkstemp()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/tempfile.py", line 286, in mkstemp
    dir = gettempdir()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/tempfile.py", line 254, in gettempdir
    tempdir = _get_default_tempdir()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/tempfile.py", line 201, in _get_default_tempdir
    ("No usable temporary directory found in %s" % dirlist))
IOError: [Errno 2] No usable temporary directory found in ['/tmp', '/var/tmp', '  



command : service nova-compute restart

rm: cannot remove `/var/lock/subsys/nova-compute': Read-only file system

Starting OpenStack Nova Compute Worker:                    [FAILED]


help...........!!!!
title: nova-compute restart throws error

comments.content:
My setup was working properly  suddenly its throwing errors : 


command : nova-manage service list 

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 80, in <module>
    from nova import context
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/context.py", line 26, in <module>
    from nova import utils
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/utils.py", line 52, in <module>
    import lockfile
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/lockfile.py", line 363, in <module>
    class SQLiteFileLock(LockBase):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/lockfile.py", line 367, in SQLiteFileLo          ck
    _fd, testdb = tempfile.mkstemp()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/tempfile.py", line 286, in mkstemp
    dir = gettempdir()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/tempfile.py", line 254, in gettempdir
    tempdir = _get_default_tempdir()
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/tempfile.py", line 201, in _get_default_tempdir
    ("No usable temporary directory found in %s" % dirlist))
IOError: [Errno 2] No usable temporary directory found in ['/tmp', '/var/tmp', '  



command : service nova-compute restart

rm: cannot remove `/var/lock/subsys/nova-compute': Read-only file system

Starting OpenStack Nova Compute Worker:                    [FAILED]


help...........!!!!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~romilg

comments.content: My problem is solved by rebooting the system :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~romilg
